title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC Review
description: Gather and document the project requirements in detail. This includes the desired materials/compounds, production goals, constraints (technical, regulatory, ethical, safety), potential environmental impact, stakeholder needs (e.g., researchers, investors, end-users), and any additional technical details or design specifications. Additionally, outline key milestones, project timelines, resource allocation, and dependencies where appropriate. The task also requires consideration of long-term maintenance and scalability requirements, as well as potential future integration with existing systems within the organization. It is important to consider both short-term and long-term research directions in the field of synthetic biology when defining these requirements.

title: Design Biosynthetic Pathways
description: Develop computational models and simulations to design biosynthetic pathways for the desired materials/compounds.

title: Develop Genetic Engineering Tools
description: Create tools and libraries for genetic engineering and manipulation of biological systems.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for researchers and engineers to interact with the biosynthetic design tools.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement a database system to store and manage biosynthetic pathways, genetic sequences, and related data.

title: Develop Testing and Validation Framework
description: Create a framework for testing and validating the designed biosynthetic pathways and genetic engineering tools.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop security measures and access controls to protect sensitive data and intellectual property.

title: Plan Deployment and Integration
description: Develop a strategy for deploying the biosynthetic design tools and integrating them with existing laboratory infrastructure.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for users and developers of the biosynthetic design tools.
